text: Ronaldo Araya (born 3 August 1999) is a Costa Rican professional footballer who plays for C.S. Cartaginés in the Costa Rican Liga FPD. Araya made his debut for the senior Costa Rica national football team at the Avaya Stadium on the 2 February 2019 against the United States. ==References== Category:C.S. Cartaginés players Category:Costa Rica international footballers Category:Costa Rican footballers Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
